properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 9 at 3:15PM PST until January 10 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Spokane WA
properties.description:
...HEAVY SNOW FRIDAY...

.A potent winter storm will move into the Inland Northwest
Friday. Light snow will begin in the morning hours on Friday with
snow fall increasing Friday afternoon and night.

* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3
inches.

* WHERE...Wenatchee, Chelan, Entiat, Cashmere, Number 1 Canyon,
Number 2 Canyon, Pangborn Airport, Waterville, Mansfield, and
Badger Mountain Road.

* WHEN...From 4 AM to 4 PM PST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning commute.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 4 PM PST FRIDAY
